title: Brillante Mendoza - Tirador (2007)
description:
About a month after the Holy Week, a major national election will take place. What future does it hold for a motley group of TIRADORS--local slang for petty thievesÃ¢â‚¬â€whose daily survival depends on fast fingers and yearly atonement on divine grace? The tiradors all live in an old dilapidated tenement building in the slums of QUIAPO, a busy business district of Manila where they ply their trade.
